Author: pierrefar
Content:
Choice of language does not affect scaling - Website architecture does... massively!

I would go for the language you know best between you too that serves your current needs. If you get successful, you will have the money to re-write the damn thing.

So just get going!

Pierre

Author: hhm
Title: The Afterlife Is Expensive for Digital Movies

Author: pierrefar
Content: Count me in. Email is in profile.

Author: ashu
Content: Actually, PHP 5 with all its object orientation and reflection features is quite liveable despite being filled with kludges around every corner.

Author: fauigerzigerk
Content: I doubt that spam "accounts for 90% of traffic on the internet". Maybe 90% of email traffic.
